roleset.name: move in spiral direction
roleset.note: SPIRAL-V NOTES: Actually, I kinda doubt the agent could appear. (from spiral.01-v)

example.name: down
example.text: Confusion about the two banks' hurried efforts to round upfinancing for a new bid that the UAL board hasn't even seen yet helpedsend UAL stock spiraling downward.

example.name: up
example.text: Kenneth Mitchell, director of Dow's polyethylene business, saysproducers were surprised to learn how much inventories had swelledthroughout the distribution chain as prices spiraled up.
